Footer.tagline: Empowering educators and businesses to create, manage, and sell courses under their own brand.

Metadata.title: Sahla LMS | Your All-in-One Learning Platform
Metadata.description: Launch, manage, and scale your online learning business with Sahla, the powerful multi-tenant LMS.

hero.title: Transform Education. Empower Creators.
hero.description: Sahla provides a robust, multi-tenant platform for you to launch, manage, and scale your online learning business with unparalleled ease and power.

multiTenancy.title: Multi-Tenancy
multiTenancy.description: Launch multiple branded learning platforms with unique subdomains, all from one powerful system.

courseManagement.title: Comprehensive Course Management
courseManagement.description: Create and manage courses with rich content, quizzes, and coding playgrounds.

payments.title: Integrated Payments
payments.description: Seamlessly sell courses and manage subscriptions with built-in Stripe integration.

step1.title: 1. Set Up Your Platform
step1.description: Quickly create your branded learning environment with our intuitive setup process.

step2.title: 2. Create & Manage Courses
step2.description: Populate your platform with engaging courses using our powerful content creation tools.

step3.title: 3. Grow Your Audience
step3.description: Attract students and scale your business with integrated marketing and analytics features.

support.title: Award-Winning Support
support.description: Our dedicated support team is always ready to help you succeed.

features.title: Innovative Features
features.description: Stay ahead with AI-powered tools, interactive coding, and more.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Join a thriving community of educators and learners.

testimonial1.quote: "Sahla transformed our online course delivery. The multi-tenancy feature is a game-changer!"
testimonial1.author: - Jane Doe, CEO of EduCorp

testimonial2.quote: "The ease of use and powerful features of Sahla allowed us to launch our academy in record time."

cta.title: Ready to Build Your Learning Empire?
cta.description: Join countless successful educators and businesses using Sahla to deliver world-class online education.

Metadata.title: Pricing & Plans | Sahla LMS
Metadata.description: Explore simple, transparent pricing plans designed for every stage of your online education business.

PricingPage.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
PricingPage.description: Choose the plan that's right for your learning platform.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I change my plan later?
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade from the trial to the Pro plan at any time from your administrative dashboard.
faq.a2: No, our pricing is transparent. The Pro plan fee covers all features listed. Transaction fees from payment gateways (like Stripe) may apply to your course sales.
faq.q3: Do you offer custom enterprise solutions?
faq.a3: Yes, for large organizations with specific needs, we offer custom enterprise plans. Please contact our sales team for more information.

Metadata.title: About Us | Sahla LMS
Metadata.description: Learn more about Sahla Learning Platform, our mission, vision, and the team behind our innovative LMS solution.

hero.title: Our Story
hero.description: At Sahla, we believe in empowering knowledge. Our mission is to provide a seamless and powerful platform for educators and organizations to share their expertise with the world.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading platform for online education, fostering a global community of learners and instructors.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A dedicated group of passionate individuals committed to innovation and excellence in e-learning.

reach.title: Our Reach
reach.description: Connecting learners and educators across the globe with a platform that knows no boundaries.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded in 2023, Sahla began with a simple idea: to make online education accessible and powerful for everyone. We started as a small team with a big vision, and through dedication and innovation, we've grown into a leading multi-tenant LMS provider. Over the years, we've continuously evolved our platform, adding features like integrated payments, AI-powered tools, and robust analytics, all while maintaining our commitment to user-friendliness and scalability. Our journey is a testament to our belief in the transformative power of education.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We operate with honesty and transparency in all our dealings.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly strive to bring new and better solutions to our users.

community.title: Community
community.description: We foster a supportive and collaborative environment for all.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We are committed to delivering high-quality products and services.

teamSection.title: Meet Our Team
teamSection.description: The passionate individuals behind Sahla's success

badran.name: Mohamed Badran
badran.bio: Visionary leader passionate about accessible education.

Metadata.title: Frequently Asked Questions | Sahla LMS
Metadata.description: Find answers to the most common questions about Sahla. Learn about account management, platform features, and more.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Have a question? We've probably answered it below.

platformFeatures.title: Platform Features
platformFeatures.a1: Sahla is a multi-tenant, web-based Learning Management System (LMS) that allows you to launch your own branded online learning platform with unique subdomains.
platformFeatures.a2: Sahla offers comprehensive course management, integrated payment processing via Stripe, user authentication, an administrative dashboard with analytics, and a customizable landing page.
platformFeatures.q3: Can I customize my learning platform?
platformFeatures.a3: Yes, Sahla provides a visual, drag-and-drop landing page editor powered by Puck, allowing you to customize your public-facing landing page without writing code.
platformFeatures.a4: Yes, Sahla integrates with the Judge0 API for executing user-submitted code in various programming languages, enabling interactive coding challenges.
platformFeatures.q5: Can Sahla help with quiz generation?
platformFeatures.a5: Absolutely! Sahla leverages OpenRouter integration for AI-powered quiz question generation, making content creation easier and faster.

pricing.title: Pricing & Subscription
pricing.q1: What are the pricing plans for Sahla?
pricing.a1: We offer various pricing plans tailored to different needs, including Basic, Pro, and Enterprise options. Please visit our pricing page for more details.
pricing.q2: Do you offer a free trial?
pricing.a2: Yes, we offer a free trial period for you to explore Sahla's features before committing to a subscription.
pricing.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.a3: We accept all major credit cards through our secure Stripe integration.
pricing.a4: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on our subscription plans. Please refer to our Terms and Conditions for more details.

support.title: Technical Support
support.a1: You can reach out to us via our contact page, or refer to our help center for common issues and guides.
support.a2: API access is available with our Enterprise plan, allowing for deeper integration and customization.
support.q3: What kind of technical assistance can I expect?
support.a3: Our technical support team is available to assist with platform setup, troubleshooting, and any technical queries you may have to ensure a smooth experience.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
